headline: AI Disruption Fears Roil Software Industry, and the Stock Market
summary: From Legalzoom.com and Expedia to Ares and Apollo, shares of companies that sell or invest in software fell sharply on Tuesday.

raw.headline: AI Disruption Fears Roil Software Industry, and the Stock Market
raw.summary: From Legalzoom.com and Expedia to Ares and Apollo, shares of companies that sell or invest in software fell sharply on Tuesday.

headline: AI Fears Sink Shares of Private-Credit Fund Managers
summary: Shares of private-fund managers fell sharply Tuesday on concerns that the advent of artificial intelligence will tank their investments in software companies.  Ares Management and Blue Owl Capital shares dropped more than 9%, while Apollo Global Management and KKR fell more than 7% and Blackstone lost over 5%.  The moves follow a steep selloff in public stocks and debt of software companies that some analysts fear will become obsolete as more companies turn to AI for their technology needs.

headline: KKR & Co. to Post Q4 Earnings: Here's What to Expect From the Stock
summary: KKR's fourth-quarter results, scheduled to be reported on Feb. 5, are likely to benefit from a rise in management fees and AUM despite expected lower earnings.
